bibl.title: The Identity and Significance of the Enemy of Osiris in Papyrus British Museum 10808.
bibl.note: Diss. Univ. of California, Los Angeles. Summary in DA 61 (2000-2001) p. 4758-A. - P. Lond. Inv. 10808 [= P. Oxy. Inv. 21/3B/29F] [descr.: W.E. CRUM, An Egyptian Text in Greek Characters, JEA 28 (1942) pp. 20-31, pll. II-III]. Fresh transcription and translation of the text (in Greek script with some Demotic characters, but the language is the ancient liturgical speech).
